definition: son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

sentences.english: "This case is no different than any other case, " Lott said yesterday.
sentences.chinese: “这只是一件普通的案子而已，”洛特昨天表示。

sentences.english: But the prosecutor declined on the grounds that the issue should be investigated in the US.
sentences.chinese: 但检察官拒绝的理由是，这个案子应当在美国调查。

sentences.english: In the court, the ministries discussed the case by varying opinions.
sentences.chinese: 议事厅里大家七嘴八舌地继续讨论这个案子。

sentences.english: The case was uncovered, little by little, by the finding of clues.
sentences.chinese: 这个案子是根据线索一点一点地捯出来的。

sentences.english: I’d survived, presiding over a trial that was neither great nor good.
sentences.chinese: 在主持了一个既不伟大也不好的案子后我终于解放了。

sentences.english: Touching the case, I suggest that we should go to ask the litigant.
sentences.chinese: 关于这个案子，我建议我们去问问当事人。

sentences.english: In both cases the women accused of posting the profiles denied it.
sentences.chinese: 两个案子中，被指称发帖的女性都矢口否认。

sentences.english: They settled the case out of court .
sentences.chinese: 他们的案子在庭外和解了。

sentences.english: By the way, this case is sub-contracted by Da-Shung Army.
sentences.chinese: 这个案子是大顺军转包给我们的。

sentences.english: Who has the brain and money to stage this smash-and-grab?
sentences.chinese: 谁有脑力和财力策划这场砸了就抢的案子？

sentences.english: The case is now before the court.
sentences.chinese: 这个案子现在已交庭审理。

sentences.english: Judges are supposed to judge each case objectively.
sentences.chinese: 法官应公正处理每一个案子。

sentences.english: That was not the case with Liu Xiaoping.
Due to his reputation, he is able to acquire the most interesting cases.
sentences.chinese: 他名声大噪，因此总能获得最有意思的案子。

sentences.english: I hope you can hold this case down like David.
sentences.chinese: 我希望你能像大卫那样把这个案子顺利地办好。

sentences.english: Pers on who act on behalf of a minor is a defendant in a court case.
sentences.chinese: 在一案子中代表未成年人被告的监护人。

definition: to conclude a case/to wind up
oral confession (as opposed to 筆供|笔供[bi3 gong4])/statement/deposition
to investigate (as detective)/to solve (crime)/to uncover (a plot)/to sniff out/to break in and analyze/detective work/to scout
